channel.title: PC Interface Text
channel.description: I just need the line id's for the text for the interface # 18691, its the PC Exp interface. I am wanting to transform it into a shop instead. So far i have managed to make a handler for 1 interface to transform into 2 shops. I just want to change it to the exp interface so that i can make the shop bigger instead.
